name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, the media reported that Chen Hongwei, the deputy mayor who was held accountable for the heavy rain on July 20, has now become a member of the Standing Committee of the Zhengzhou Municipal Party Committee.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A Xiaohongshu netizen said that he just posted some pictures of Shanghai Halloween in a WeChat group on Xiaohongshu. The post was quite popular, so he was asked by the police to take a statement.
He was told that the people in the photos he posted were also asked to talk.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User submissions
Hupu college students' ratings of Youth University Study:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, the recruiter announced to suspend the registration

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
I am a bit overwhelmed by studying politics for the postgraduate entrance examination, so I would like to contribute an ordinary college student's thoughts on his changes over the past four years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens on Weibo said that their social media accounts were checked by the responsible personnel during their political review.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A student posted a video on TikTok saying that he was dissatisfied with the school's policy of forcing students to cut their hair, and spoke out in the grade group (Figure 1). He believed that the Education Bureau did not have any mandatory requirements for students' hairstyles, and that the school and parents could encourage students to cut their hair short, but they should not force students to cut their hair. In the end, he was asked to suspend his studies by the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 18, the media reported that a Chinese student studying in France was arrested on suspicion of "glorifying terrorism" for drawing graffiti with anti-Israel elements. Although the court believed that his graffiti was "not enough to be considered anti-Semitic", the police still requested his deportation. It is reported that the student is 25 years old and is studying at the National Higher School of Art in Bourges, France. He has now appealed to the court

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, at the Xitucheng subway entrance in Beijing, a naked man ran wildly, with a police car chasing him.
